00020 #ifndef OPENRAVE_INTERFACE_BASE
00021 #define OPENRAVE_INTERFACE_BASE
00022 
00023 namespace OpenRAVE {
00024 
00026 enum SerializationOptions
00027 {
00028     SO_Kinematics = 0x01, 
00029     SO_Dynamics = 0x02, 
00030     SO_BodyState = 0x04, 
00031     SO_NamesAndFiles = 0x08, 
00032     SO_RobotManipulators = 0x10, 
00033     SO_RobotSensors = 0x20, 
00034     SO_Geometry = 0x40, 
00035 };
00036 
00040 class OPENRAVE_API InterfaceBase : public boost::enable_shared_from_this<InterfaceBase>
00041 {
00042 public:
00043     typedef std::map<std::string, XMLReadablePtr, CaseInsensitiveCompare> READERSMAP;
00044 
00045     InterfaceBase(InterfaceType type, EnvironmentBasePtr penv);
00046     virtual ~InterfaceBase();
00047 
00048     inline InterfaceType GetInterfaceType() const {
00049         return __type;
00050     }
00051 
00055     inline const std::string& GetXMLId() const {
00056         return __strxmlid;
00057     }
00058 
00061     inline const std::string& GetPluginName() const {
00062         return __strpluginname;
00063     }
00064 
00066     inline EnvironmentBasePtr GetEnv() const {
00067         return __penv;
00068     }
00069 
00070     inline const READERSMAP& GetReadableInterfaces() const {
00071         return __mapReadableInterfaces;
00072     }
00073     inline XMLReadablePtr GetReadableInterface(const std::string& xmltag) const
00074     {
00075         READERSMAP::const_iterator it = __mapReadableInterfaces.find(xmltag);
00076         return it != __mapReadableInterfaces.end() ? it->second : XMLReadablePtr();
00077     }
00078 
00080     virtual const std::string& GetDescription() const {
00081         return __description;
00082     }
00083 
00084     virtual void SetDescription(const std::string& description) {
00085         __description = description;
00086     }
00087 
00089     virtual void SetUserData(UserDataPtr data) {
00090         __pUserData = data;
00091     }
00093     virtual void SetUserData(boost::shared_ptr<void> data) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
00094         __pUserData = boost::static_pointer_cast<UserData>(data);
00095     }
00097     virtual UserDataPtr GetUserData() const {
00098         return __pUserData;
00099     }
00100 
00102     virtual const std::string& GetURI() const {
00103         return __struri;
00104     }
00105     virtual const std::string& GetXMLFilename() const {
00106         return __struri;
00107     }
00108 
00114     virtual void Clone(InterfaceBaseConstPtr preference, int cloningoptions);
00115 
00129     virtual bool SendCommand(std::ostream& os, std::istream& is);
00130 
00131     // serializes the interface, use an official serialization library?
00132     //virtual void Serialize(std::ostream& o, int options) const;
00133 
00134 protected:
00140     typedef boost::function<bool (std::ostream&, std::istream&)> InterfaceCommandFn;
00141     class OPENRAVE_API InterfaceCommand
00142     {
00143 public:
00144         InterfaceCommand() {
00145         }
00146         InterfaceCommand(InterfaceCommandFn newfn, const std::string& newhelp) : fn(newfn), help(newhelp) {
00147         }
00148         InterfaceCommandFn fn; 
00149         std::string help; 
00150     };
00151 
00158     virtual void RegisterCommand(const std::string& cmdname, InterfaceCommandFn fncmd, const std::string& strhelp);
00159 
00161     virtual void UnregisterCommand(const std::string& cmdname);
00162 
00163     virtual const char* GetHash() const = 0;
00164     std::string __description;     
00165 
00166 private:
00168     virtual bool _GetCommandHelp(std::ostream& sout, std::istream& sinput) const;
00169 
00170     mutable boost::mutex _mutexInterface; 
00171     InterfaceType __type; 
00172     boost::shared_ptr<void> __plugin; 
00173     std::string __struri; 
00174     std::string __strpluginname; 
00175     std::string __strxmlid; 
00176     EnvironmentBasePtr __penv; 
00177     UserDataPtr __pUserData; 
00178 
00179     READERSMAP __mapReadableInterfaces; 
00180     typedef std::map<std::string, boost::shared_ptr<InterfaceCommand>, CaseInsensitiveCompare> CMDMAP;
00181     CMDMAP __mapCommands; 
00182 
00183 #ifdef RAVE_PRIVATE
00184 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00185     friend class Environment;
00186     friend class OpenRAVEXMLParser::InterfaceXMLReader;
00187     friend class ColladaReader;
00188 #else
00189     friend class ::Environment;
00190     friend class ::OpenRAVEXMLParser::InterfaceXMLReader;
00191     friend class ::ColladaReader;
00192 #endif
00193 #endif
00194     friend class RaveDatabase;
00195 };

00197 } // end namespace OpenRAVE
